channel.title: Offering VPS
channel.description:
Well I am wanting to host a server, but unfortunately real life beckons and I am struggling to find the time to develop one myself. What I am offering is a VPS with the following spec:
RAM: 1024MB dedicated, 1536MB burstable Space: 40GB dedicated space Bandwidth: 500GB of premium bandwidth
It is all paid for by myself, and currently waiting for a server. If anybody is interested please post on here.
Note: I do not just want you to download a server and get it hosted. The server must be unique in some ways. I will only host a Deltascape server if it's heavily modified.

item.title: Offering VPS
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

No requesting 'coders', hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.

Read full topic
